group_1.textCenter: (That went way better than I thought it@would...)
(They said that, with my abilities, I was@more than welcome...)
(They must be really shorthanded. They@didn't even look into my past.)

group_1.textRight: Are you ready, new recruit? Hurry it up.

group_1.textCenter: (Are we really doing this while wearin' such@hideous robes? They've gotta be joking...)
(Plus, I'm on the bottom rung... Black@Wings, was it?)
(I'm not the type to sneak around with my@face all covered up...)

group_1.textRight: What's taking so long? We should be on our@way soon.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, do I really gotta wear this?

group_1.textRight: It's not mandatory, but you should at least@cover your face.

group_1.textLeft: Nothin'. I'm good without the cloak.

group_1.textRight: [chara:715100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! You don't want to cover your face?

group_1.textLeft: It's not like I have to wear it, right?
More importantly, why don't you tell me@what I'm supposed to be doing?

group_1.textRight: Yes, our duty is to get rid of whoever is@erasing the Uwasa.
I heard you're pretty strong, but stay@focused.
We're up against veteran Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: (Veteran Magical Girls who are goin' around@erasing Uwasa, huh...)

group_1.narration: I could take a guess who that is...

group_1.textLeft: (It'll be a pain if we run into each other,@so I better try to avoid them.)
(Time for them to show me what this is all@about...)
